Html:
AFAIK the new set bonus isnt included in the current version of Rawr.
How strong is it approximatly? It's hard to compare non-set pieces from Naxx without knowing :p
New version coming soon, I'll make sure the feral set bonuses work.
By "new version", do you mean 2.1.2 ? Because that still doesnt seem to have 2p t7 feral bonus included.
Yes, 2.1.2 includes working 2T7. What are you not seeing?
A mix of 'Valorous' and 'Heroes' items is not working in Rawr.

You may have the data for the items from the Armory, instead of Wowhead. Armory provides poor data at the moment, try refreshing the data for the items in question from Wowhead. The set bonus does work, you just have to have 2/4 of the set equipped.
Hm strange... I guess my item cache is messed up then. I've opened it with a text editor and there is no <Setname> tag anywhere in the dreamwalker items.
Just refresh their data from Wowhead, it's fast and easy.
